comment: Alternate definition of a function. One possibility for the definition of a function in [Enderton] p. 42. (Enderton's definition is ambiguous because "there is only one" could mean either "there is at most one" or "there is exactly one." However, ~ dffun8 shows that it doesn't matter which meaning we pick.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2002.)
